a: Heck yeah. The Figicons CLI & package will be free and open source forever.

q: Can I import my own icons?
a: Yep! Apart from the default icons, you can add your own ones that you've designed in Figma. Check the 'Custom Icons' section to learn more.
Currently Figicons only support a direct integration with Figma due to the ease of their API platform. There are no plans as of yet to support other design tools.
The Designer Pack is a downloadable folder containing all the default icons in SVG format. The aim of it is for designers to be able to use the out-of-the-box icons within their designs.
Yes. Figicons optimizes & cleans all stroke properties from imported icons and adds a unified style over them, which you can override using the config from the API.

q: Does Figicons store any of my data?
a: Nope! Your icons are safe with you when you build them on your machine, nothing gets sent to us. We don't even have servers.
Not yet, however there are plans to support a web platform with team functionality to automate importing custom icons from Figma and converting them directly to React components.
